resources.string: Oh no! Everyone in the world has been infected by a mysterious virus and became a \'single dog\', except for you. To survive in this world, try your best to dodge the attack of single dogs. Good luck!

This game was a team lab created for the HKUSPACE Mobile Application Development course during 2017-2018 Semester 2, by the following members of CL-01 Group 1: 
CHEUNG Pui Kin, Bacon (20026225) 
HO Po Sum, Sum (20028157) 
LAM Wai Hin, Jeanie (20031815) 
LI Kwan To, Tommy (20027290) 
NG Hoi Wa, Paul (20025578) 
WONG Kam Yi, Janice (20030531)
